articles.title: Salt Bae touched the World Cup trophy after Argentina win, gets criticised online - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Turkish chef was seen kissing the trophy, hoisting it above his head and striking his familiar pose of pretending to sprinkle salt on it.
articles.content: Salt Bae, the Turkish chef famous for his salt sprinkling prowess, is facing criticism for handling the World Cup trophy as he stood on the pitch with the Argentina squad as they celebrated their win… [+390 chars]

articles.title: Less magic show, more singing: Unhappy Jay Chou fans blast singer on social media after his concert - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Concertgoers complained that they saw more of the singer's guests performing and singing than Chou himself during his Carnival World Tour shows in Singapore on Dec 17 and 18. Others were unhappy that the complimentary light sticks didn't work well.
articles.content:
"HE REALLY TRIED HIS BEST"
Some netizens speculated that the unhappy reviewers were haters or "heifen" ("black fans" in Chinese) posing as fans to mar Chou's reputation.

articles.title: Big Bet's cast on shooting a K-drama in the Philippines with… South Korea's own Johnny Depp? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Disney+’s highly anticipated new K-drama marks Oldboy actor Choi Min-sik's return to television after 25 years. The cast and director tell CNA Lifestyle what it was like working with the legendary veteran actor and shooting in the Philippines.
